price: Hakika haya ni mawaidha; basi anaye taka atashika Njia ya kwenda kwa Mola wake Mlezi.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: Hakika Sura hii ni mawaidha kwa walimwengu wote. Basi mwenye kutaka atafuata njia ya Imani na uchamngu kwendea kwa Mola wake Mlezi imfikishe kwenye maghfira yake na Pepo yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
